definition: Thumbnail-size (often 100x100) non-linearly stretched preview JPEGs of observations created by the Ring-Moon Systems Node. Previews of images are colored according to the filter used. Previews from non-imaging instruments attempt to represent the contents of observations in a visual way. Previews are not appropriate for scientific use.

Small-size (often 256x256) non-linearly stretched preview JPEGs of observations created by the Ring-Moon Systems Node. Previews of images are colored according to the filter used. Previews from non-imaging instruments attempt to represent the contents of observations in a visual way. Previews are not appropriate for scientific use.

Medium-size (often 512x512) non-linearly stretched preview JPEGs of observations created by the Ring-Moon Systems Node. Previews of images are colored according to the filter used. Previews from non-imaging instruments attempt to represent the contents of observations in a visual way. Previews are not appropriate for scientific use.

Full-size non-linearly stretched preview JPEGs of observations created by the Ring-Moon Systems Node. Previews of images are not colored. Previews from non-imaging instruments attempt to represent the contents of observations in a visual way. Previews are not appropriate for scientific use.
Thumbnail-size (often 100x100) JPEGs of diagrams that attempt to convey the context of observations (such as the extent of surface coverage) in a visual way.
Small-size JPEGs of diagrams that attempt to convey the context of observations (such as the extent of surface coverage) in a visual way.
Medium-size JPEGs of diagrams that attempt to convey the context of observations (such as the extent of surface coverage) in a visual way.
Full-size JPEGs of diagrams that attempt to convey the context of observations (such as the extent of surface coverage) in a visual way.

Text files ([volume]_inventory.tab) that list every planet and moon inside the instrument field of view for every observation in a particular volume. Associated labels (*.lbl) describe the contents of the text files.

Text files ([volume]_[planet]_summary.tab) that list the values of various surface geometry metadata for the central planet for every observation in a particular volume. Associated labels (*.lbl) describe the contents of the text files.

Text files ([volume]_moon_summary.tab) that list the values of various surface geometry metadata for every moon in the field of view for every observation in a particular volume. Associated labels (*.lbl) describe the contents of the text files.

Text files ([volume]_ring_summary.tab) that list the values of various ring plane intercept geometry metadata for every observation in a particular volume. Associated labels (*.lbl) describe the contents of the text files.
Raw image files (*.IMG) for Cassini ISS. Images are in VICAR format, uncalibrated, and in units of DN (data number). Associated labels (*.LBL) are text files that contain information about the image.

Calibrated image files (*_CALIB.IMG) for Cassini ISS. Images are in VICAR format and have been calibrated at the Ring-Moon Systems Node using the CISSCAL pipeline. They are in units of I/F. Associated labels (*.LBL) are text files that contain information about the image and its calibration.

Thumbnail-size (50x50) non-linearly stretched preview JPEGs of observations supplied by the Cassini Imaging team. The previews are not colored and the stretch may be different from the browse images produced by the Ring-Moon Systems Node.

Medium-size (256x256) non-linearly stretched preview JPEGs of observations supplied by the Cassini Imaging team. The previews are not colored and the stretch may be different from the browse images produced by the Ring-Moon Systems Node.

Full-size non-linearly stretched preview PNGs or TIFFs of observations supplied by the Cassini Imaging team. The previews are not colored and the stretch may be different from the browse images produced by the Ring-Moon Systems Node.
